alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Dare and northeastern Tyrrell Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Old Trap to near Frying Pan Landing. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manns Harbor, Mashoes, Manteo, East Lake and Buffalo City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
